# Run and deploy your AI Studio app This contains everything you need to run your app locally. View your app in AI Studio: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1nbtNgyGs47Yic2-fPK60KlhxqluRDRCo ## Run Locally **Prerequisites:** Node.js 1. Install dependencies: `npm install` 2. Set the `GEMINI_API_KEY` in [.env.local](.env.local) to your Gemini API key 3. Run the app: `npm run dev`

import React from 'react'; import { AnimatedSection } from '../components/common/AnimatedSection'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Award, Globe, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; export function About() { return (

Our Story

From a simple dream to a beloved community hub, this is the story of Greenleaf Coffee.

Founded on Passion

Greenleaf Coffee was born from a lifelong passion for coffee and community. Our founder, Jane Doe, traveled the world exploring coffee farms and learning the art of the perfect brew. She returned to Portland with a vision: to create a space that not only served exceptional coffee but also fostered connection and warmth.

Opened in 2022, Greenleaf Coffee quickly became a local favorite, known for its meticulous pour-overs, cozy atmosphere, and the friendly faces behind the counter.

Our Core Values

Quality

Sourcing the finest beans and ingredients is non-negotiable.

Sustainability

Caring for our planet is at the heart of every decision we make.

Community

Creating a welcoming space for everyone to connect and belong.
